item.title: Darlene Love - Christmas - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords used: F, Am, Bb, C7, Dm
As performed by Darlene Love
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/HJmjt8pwp6I
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at:
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.

item.title: Julie Andrews - My Favorite Things - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: Dm, Bbmaj7, Gm, C7, F, Bb, A7, D, G, G7, Em, Cmaj7, Am, D7, C, B7, E, A, D6
As performed by Julie Andrews in “The Sound of Music”
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/4eFEPAiSnjA
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/m/misc-movies/my-favorite-things-two/

item.title: Panic! At The Disco - Into The Unknown
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords Used: G, D, Bm, Dm, C, F, Dm7, A, D, E, C#m, Cm, Bb
As performed by PANIC! AT THE DISCO, as featured in Disney's FROZEN II

item.title: Josh Groban - What Child Is This?
item.description:
What Child is This by Josh Groban. It has been lowered by 1 semitone so young musicians can play along, also it’s just the first two verses and fades out at the key change. For educational use. Chords Used: Dm C A F
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
